thread.title: ‘Fatality’! Sen. Tim Scott gracefully smacks down racist haters upset by his Sessions support
thread.title_full: ‘Fatality’! Sen. Tim Scott gracefully smacks down racist haters upset by his Sessions support

author: Sarah D.
title: ‘Fatality’! Sen. Tim Scott gracefully smacks down racist haters upset by his Sessions support
text:
The Left has a lot to learn — maybe they could start by taking some pages from Sen. Scott’s book. @SenatorTimScott Thanks for a great sense of humor. 
— Susan MacDonald (@SPM5001) January 10, 2017 @SenatorTimScott thank you for being a hero on twitter today. #hatersgonnahate 
— Rach Hill (@rachhill) January 10, 2017 @SenatorTimScott Loved not just by your constituents, but the grateful nation, Senator. Thank you for your grace.
